description: Managed high-scale microservices handling multi-billion payment API requests monthly, ensuring 99.99% uptime and reliability. Led migration of critical payment service to FastAPI from scratch, reducing response time by ~35% and improving system performance. Oversaw deployment lifecycle and optimized infrastructure on AWS, reducing latency. Maintained and enhanced multiple microservices environments, improving scalability and resource utilization. Integrated LLM-powered solutions for internal tools and customer-facing workflows, improving efficiency and reducing manual intervention.

Spearheaded development of Incentive and Compensation (IC) and Segmentation and Targeting (S&T) modules, reducing processing time for complex data calculations by 30%. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using FastAPI and Flask, improving user satisfaction by 20% through Auto-dist and Rollup features. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deploy and maintain scalable solutions, ensuring seamless integration with existing enterprise systems.

Built robust web applications with Django, Flask, and React, enhancing user experience and accelerating feature delivery. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks, improving release efficiency and reducing production issues by 30%. Achieved 91% in Infosys Training, ranking among the top 40 students of the batch.

company: International Institute of Information Technology, Bangalore
description: Advanced computer science education focusing on algorithms, software engineering, and research methodologies. Completed projects in Sentimental Analysis of Movie Reviews and Query Forum using DevOps. Represented IIITB in Smart India Hackathon 2020 organized by AICTE. Secured 98.84 Percentile in GATE 2019.

company: Dharmsinh Desai Institute of Technology, Nadiad
description: Comprehensive undergraduate education in Information Technology with focus on programming, databases, and software development. Built foundational knowledge in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
Automated sentiment classification for thousands of raw comments, reducing manual effort by ~120+ hours. Implemented machine learning models for natural language processing and sentiment analysis.
Automated the entire Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) using DevOps methodologies, reducing deployment time by ~40%. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation.
